column4: still have the issue: updated to Kernel Linux 2.6.35-28-generic on 10.10, compositing doesn't work, compiz/docky effects gone, etc
also my screen goes bonkers for a bit and then returns to Boring Mode
but no errors in the terminal?
Yeah, need to see those buddy
they appeared out of nowhere when I pressed the up button in the terminal window. Here it is; sorry for the highlighting: http://paste.pocoo.org/show/359754/
Do you not remember?  (lspci -k)  Please list the driver / module as well as the card.
You'll link me?  I don't need links.  I'm up to my ears in links over here.
hahaha.  I have a screenshot of it already!  Turn compiz off and the bugs will go away :)
Or use an older version of Ubuntu
